LanguageData.SW_ShowPowerOffIcon: Show Power Off Icon (requires map reload)
LanguageData.SW_ShowPowerOffIconDesc: Toggle off to hide the power-off icon for wall sections currently flicked off of power.
LanguageData.SW_AlertPulseIntensityDesc: Adjust the slider to either increase or decrease the intensity (brightness, alpha channel) of the alert wall pulse effect.
LanguageData.SW_AlertPulseIntervalDesc: Adjust the slider to either increase or decrease the interval (time between pulses) of the alert wall pulse effect.
LanguageData.SW_UseThreatSpecificAlertColors: Use Threat-Specific Alert Colors (changes saved on closing of settings | unchecking resets colors to previous state)
LanguageData.SW_UseThreatSpecificAlertColorsDesc: Turning this on will negate default alert wall pulse colors and override them with those specified in additional settings below.\n\nIf multiple different threats are present the colors are averaged.
